db:abstract.db:para: Offers particle shape from model for emitters and affectors.
This type was introduced in Qt 6.2.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: The ParticleModelShape3D element can be used to get particle shape from a 3D model.
For example, to emit particles from outlines of a model shape:

db:section.db:title: delegate : Component
db:section.db:para: The delegate provides a template defining the model for the ParticleModelShape3D. For example, using the default sphere model with default material

db:section.db:title: fill : bool
db:section.db:para: This property defines if the shape should be filled or just use the shape outlines.
